mapper.select: SELECT alarmNo, alarmAct, alarmContent, alarmTime, userNo, monAct, tueAct, wedAct, thuAct, friAct, satAct, sunAct FROM alarm;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm (alarmAct, alarmContent, alarmTime, userNo, monAct, tueAct, wedAct, thuAct, friAct, satAct, sunAct) VALUES ("Y", #{alarmContent}, #{alarmTime}, #{userNo}, #{monAct}, #{tueAct}, #{wedAct}, #{thuAct}, #{friAct}, #{satAct}, #{sunAct});
